column5: well done you guys...that was a great opener,and your aniversary to boot....glad to see you enjoyed your first trout opener and got some real nice sized steelhead....cheers

Hey there!  Too bad we didn't make the connection yesterday.  Hope you had a good opener...it was a pleasure meeting and chatting with you.  I heard you pulled one out of that spot we were both drifting.  Good job...I couldn't get them to sniff my bait...LOL.  Maybe we'll see you out there again!  Cliff
Yeah...you gotta get up here soon!  We had a fun day out there that's for sure.  As for our team name "Steel Eyes"....I like that better than "Wall Heads"....LOL
Thanks!   Always figure it is worth it if I am doing something I really enjoy.  The knee should be fine in a few days....slap on the ice etc. and carry on!  bly

Awesome report and nice fish.  Fishing on the opener for the first time is a lot like losing your virginity...Good or bad, you'll never forget it.  Too bad about the knee...You're a real trouper to go through that.
WTG Cliff and Carol you guys are starting to make this look like a routine awesome report.Nice pics
I love seeing your transition. Waders, Vests, New gear, Tool talk,  When are you starting your own show?  Actually, that's a good idea..........................
Congrats on a great day guys, nice fish.
Well done!  I'm drooling overhere!!  Tight Loops  HD
Congrats on your first opener.......great pics!  dk
bly what is that white stuff on your knee :D  WOW what a woman takes her husband fishing on Valentine's day and her anniversary . If we weren't all ready related

Nice job guuys. I though i recognized you from somewhere. I was the one who was fishing under the bridge for the most part and then I walk down to the pool that ccm was fishing. Did you guys end up goiing anywhere else?? right after you left that hole i managed to get a nice male from under the logs. Ill be back there today so I hope to see you around.
Sounds like you guy's had a quality fun filled day of chrome.

Troupers man  I tell ya. Im happy you got some action. Bly sorry about the knee, sacrifices pain and work, all this just to have a little fun. To me its always worth it. Take another look at those great pictures, in 40 years you will be happy you could even balance that good. lol
